channel.title: Stories on Alexia
channel.description: Recent content in Stories on Alexia

item.title: A simple text analysis tool
item.description: ðŸ“Œ Click Here. Have you encountered a long article that you just don’t have the time to read? Here is a trick to help you grasp the main idea. Just by copy-pasting the text, you will see the following: Summary: The most crucial sentence of the article. (Calculated by using vector representations) Wordcloud: Top N most frequently appeared non-trivial words. (NLTK) Sentiment: The decomposed sentiment scores. Whether it has positive, negative, neutral, or compound sentiment.
